# List of ministers of kingdom relations of the Netherlands__disambig_1

|deputy                   = Zsolt Szabó  as State Secretary for Kingdom Relations and Digitalisation

|website                  = [https://www.government.nl/government/members-of-cabinet/judith-uitermark Minister of the Interior and Kingdom Relations]
}}
The minister of the interior and kingdom relations () is the head of the Ministry of the Interior and Kingdom Relations and a member of the Cabinet and the Council of Ministers and dual serves as the minister of the interior. The current minister is Judith Uitermark of the New Social Contract (NSC) party who has been in office since 2 July 2024. Regularly, a state secretary is assigned to the ministry who is tasked with specific portfolios. The current state secretary is Zsolt Szabó of the Party for Freedom (PVV) who also has been in office since 2 July 2024 and has been assigned the portfolios of kingdom relations and digital government.
